text: yas'aluk -ayha alrswl- kafaar "mk" ean alsaaeat mataa qyamha? qul lhm: eilm qyamha eind allah la yzhrha 'iilaa hw, thaqul elmha, wkhfy ela ahl alsmwat walard, fala yaelam waqt qyamha mlak mqrrab wala nabiin mrsl, la tjy' alsaaeat 'iilaa fjat, yas'aluk hwla' alqawm eanha ka'anak haris ealaa aleilm bha, mstqs bialsuwal enha, qul lhm: 'iinama eilmuha eind allah aladhi yaelam ghayb alsmwat walard, wlknn 'akthar alnaas la yaelamun 'ana dhlk la yaelamh 'iilaa allh
